data.title: One account for all apps
points: One user account that will let the users connect to all applications on your organization. Supports single sign on (SSO), so that user don't have to re-enter sign-in information on every application. When a user signs out from one application, session is invalidated for all other applications.

data.title: Sign in using social identity
points: Supported external identity providers - Outlook, Google, Facebook
Choose which external identity providers you would like your company members to use
You can limit the sign in only to native oneauth method

data.title: Customizable Sign in page
points: You can customize your company branding information. You can choose between two sign-in page layouts and choose your own brand specific logo and background. In addition, you can write your own sign-in page for the UX and connect with our REST API for authentication services in the backend.
